column3: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which Investigation was Refused (Col.3)
column4: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False/Mistake of Fact or Law Etc. (Col.4)
column5: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col. 5)
column6: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which Investigation was Completed - Chargesheets were Submitted (Col. 6)
column7: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which Investigation was Completed - Total (Col. 7) = (Col.4 + Col.5 + Col.6)
